# Cardano enviroments

![](https://ucarecdn.com/b2d8ccbe-5460-4c02-bb23-7a2425b9affb/)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27640%27%20height=%27308%27/%3e)
![Cardano enviroments](/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fucarecdn.com%2Fe8396f6b-0e05-4c5b-b8b2-0d7aac482d45%2F&w=1920&q=75)

## Production (mainnet)

Usage: Live Production. Only gets official mainnet releases.

Explorer: <https://cexplorer.io/>

## Preview testnet

Usage: Testing release candidates and mainnet releases. Leads mainnet hard forks by at least 4 weeks.

Explorer: <https://preview.cexplorer.io/>

## Pre-production testnet

Usage: Testing release candidates and mainnet releases. Forks at approximately same time as mainnet (within an epoch of each other).

Explorer: <https://preprod.cexplorer.io/>

## Old testnet (legacy)

Note that the Cardano **testnet** is no longer recommended for new functionality testing. It only supports nodes v.1.35.0, v.1.35.1, and v.1.35.2. The testnet will be fully deprecated after Vasil mainnet release.

Explorer: <https://testnet.cexplorer.io/>

Configuration files for cardano-node are available in official documentation about enviroments: <https://github.com/input-output-hk/cardano-world/blob/master/docs/environments.md>

## 2 contributors

![](https://ucarecdn.com/4f580f1c-e076-45b2-8a8d-af75d20c0cfd/)
![](https://ucarecdn.com/b2d8ccbe-5460-4c02-bb23-7a2425b9affb/)

We encourage you to actively participate in the creation and moderation of our contentâ€”your contributions are invaluable. All content is reviewed by another community member.
